video.title: How to Find Freelance Jobs
video.description:
Learn about freelance jobs and how to find them both online and in your city.

⭐️ Course Contents ⭐️
⌨️ (02:10) What is freelancing?
⌨️ (11:31) Tasks to complete prior to beginning marketing.
⌨️ (25:00) Getting clients online
⌨️ (38:20) Getting clients in your city

Resources Mentioned In Video:
🔗 https://html5up.net/
🔗 https://www.google.com/intl/en_us/business/
🔗 https://www.vistaprint.com/
🔗 https://voice.google.com/
🔗 https://www.bni.com/

Prior Videos:
🎥 Ultimate Freelancing Guide for Web Developers: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4TIvB8zDFio
🎥 Making Money as a Freelance Developer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fsTzLgra5dQ
🎥 Taxes for Freelancers & Startups: https://youtu.be/AtIB_3_DZUk

✏️ This video was created by Luke Ciciliano. He is a web developer who writes on issues related to business & entrepreneurship.

Luke’s business and Twitter urls are below:
🔗 https://www.modern-website.design/
🔗 https://twitter.com/Luke_Ciciliano

Stock Video Attribution:
‣ Video by Lukasz Radziejewski from  Pexels
‣ Video by Pressmaster from  Pexels
‣ Video by Pavel Danilyuk from  Pexels
‣ Video by Craig Dennis from  Pexels
‣ Video by  Ketut Subiyanto  from  Pexels

topLevelComment.author: freeCodeCamp.org
topLevelComment.text: Luke will be holding his first live stream on March 10th, 2021 at 7pm EST. The topic will be getting clients and running one's freelance business. The link to the stream can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=leetjRFhSs8

topLevelComment.author: Chris Mann
topLevelComment.text: Thanks so much for this very clear and direct advice. I'd agree with a quality over quantity approach and ownership of blog/video content

topLevelComment.author: jammRJ
topLevelComment.text: First get a decent job, maybe intern, learn the skills and then freelance. Nobody wants to hire a freelance newbie. Also compared to big tech programming jobs, freelancing is much less lucrative and more stressful.

replies.author: Holy Duck
replies.text: Say that to low wage employees from Bangladesh and India

topLevelComment.author: Alam Khan
topLevelComment.text:
-you need to service existing customer first
-establish your branding
-build your website n portfolio

-if you invest on things that you own like blog post, video n other content, you really increase your profitability real fast [compounds over time]

-work for other developers [Find outsource opportunities]
-outsource from other dev company

topLevelComment.author: Paul Mendes
topLevelComment.text: Great in depth video about what a freelancer realistically does and how to find freelance jobs. While this lifestyle requires you to work hard and stay consistent, once you are able to build a profitable business and gain freedom in your life you will never look back. I encourage anyone who is aspiring to become a freelancer to try it out, find an in-demand skill that you are passionate about, and don't give up. Becoming self-employed was the best decision I ever made. Thanks for this video, and sharing your freelance knowledge to the world!

replies.author: Ivorian Koua
replies.text:
Bro software engineering extand it to web , mobile... dev job rely on the use of English , so you better learning English now instead of searching a workaround.
You can also use openclassroom that have some good french ressources , but you'll agree with me that mostly all best learning ressources are in ENGLISH so LEARN IT!

Il n'est pas encore trop tard pour te mettre a l'apprentissage de l'anglais , t'aura plus a gagner pour ton futur dans le domaine du développement.
Tu peux aussi utiliser OpenClassroom , mais ce serait juste fuire le problème car la plupart des bonnes ressources de formations sont en Anglais.
APPREND L'ANGLAIS!
